NomaiObject: Clue to convey: White holes are impenetrable (so how do return warps work?) Excavation Site 1 CLARY: We will need to return to the White Hole Station to run a full diagnostic, Poke. Should we jump into the black hole together this time? 2 1 POKE: That won't be necessary, Clary! Now that the warp receiver is connected, we can simply use the return warp to return to the White Hole Station. 3 1 POKE: Wait, Clary! The White Hole Station is not operational yet! Do not jump into the black hole! 4 3 POKE: A warp transmitter requires a connected warp receiver to function; the White Hole Station's warp transmitter does not yet have a connected warp receiver for it to transport Nomai to at this time! 5 4 CLARY: What?! Poke, of course you would leave this step for last.. Has a site for the White Hole Station's warp receiver been chosen yet? 6 5 POKE: There should be ample space on the surface above the Hanging City. Building the warp receiver there should also provide convenient travel back to the city from the White Hole Station. 7 6 CLARY: In that case, I'm off to install the warp receiver; I simply cannot wait to finally jump into a black hole, after living above one my whole life! BH_H EX1 1 BH_H EX3 4
